results.title: Protect your Okta environment - Microsoft Defender for Cloud Apps
results.description: How Defender for Cloud Apps helps protect your Okta environment As an identity and access management solution, Okta holds the keys to your organizations most business critical services. Okta manages the authentication and authorization processes for your users and customers. Connecting Okta to Defender for Cloud Apps gives you improved insights.

descriptions.content: How Defender for Cloud Apps helps protect your Okta environment As an identity and access management solution, Okta holds the keys to your organizations most business critical services. Okta manages the authentication and authorization processes for your users and customers. Connecting Okta to Defender for Cloud Apps gives you improved insights.

results.title: Microsoft Defender for Identity XDR security alerts - Microsoft Defender for Identity
results.description: High T1110 xdr_OktaMultipleFailedLogons Multiple failed Okta sign in attempts followed by successful sign in with anomalous user behaviorDescription:Multiple failed sign-in attempts followed by a successful sign-in were observed for user {AccountUpn} within a short time span.  ...gh-risk properties {RiskyBehaviors}, classified by OktaHigh T1187,.

results.title: Remediation actions - Microsoft Defender for Identity
results.description: Active Directory, Microsoft Entra ID, and Okta Enable Re-enables accounts that were previously disabled for the selected identity. Active Directory, Microsoft Entra ID, and Okta Revoke session Revoke an identity's active session. Roles and Permissions Remediation Action Active Directory Microsoft Entra ID Okta Disable Refer to Required permissions.
